title: Anyone know what font this is?
content: Does any one know what font this is?
author: Mike palmer

comments.content: Looks like an extra bold customization of [Perpetua](http://web.archive.org/web/20090409232310/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125219.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Bowen+Hospital&sampleSize=40).
